name: CVE-2010-0322
description: SQL injection vulnerability in the init function in MK-AnydropdownMenu (mk_anydropdownmenu) extension 0.3.28 and earlier for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:matthias_karr:mk_anydropdownmenu:0.3.10:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:matthias_karr:mk_anydropdownmenu:0.3.23:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:matthias_karr:mk_anydropdownmenu:0.3.13:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:matthias_karr:mk_anydropdownmenu:0.3.26:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:matthias_karr:mk_anydropdownmenu:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:matthias_karr:mk_anydropdownmenu:0.3.25:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:matthias_karr:mk_anydropdownmenu:0.3.27:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:matthias_karr:mk_anydropdownmenu:0.3.12:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:typo3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
